content:
I am a neuroscientist currently working in UCL in the team of the Prof. Caswell Barry. I did my PhD (and wrote a thesis) at the Institut de Neurobiologie de la Méditerranée in the beautiful city of Marseille in the team of Dr. Jérôme Epsztein.
My research focus on how information from the outside world influences our cognitive map in a region called the hippocampus. For this I use a combination of methods (electrophysiology, calcium imaging…) to monitor neuronal activity while animal perform behavioural tasks in Virtual Reality.
I also really like to code and love doing data science, machine learning on neural activity to better understand how information is encoded by neurons. You can find most of my code on GitHub .
